The constructor.

Parameters:
gm12smstalker The GM12SMSTalker that called the function.
smsProcessor The SMSProcessor for deliverance of the SMS.
monitor The monitor to lock out incoming SMS:s.
memoryIndex The index to send to the phone in "CGMR".

Member Function Documentation

void GM12ReceiverThread::run (   ) 
 

The thread itself.

Gets an SMS from the phone and then deletes it from the memory in the phone. After that it invokes smsProcessor->SMSReceived( ... ). Then it dies the horrible ThreadDeath. ( or at least it exits from run).
